name: OR_CASE_CHRONICITY
description: Table OR_CASE_CHRONICITY indicates if a patient's exam is routine or surveillance to help in prioritization.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHRONICITY_C_NAME
columns.description: This category indicates if a patient's exam is routine or surveillance to help in prioritization.
